settings.title: Are hard shell blue crabs a sustainable, eco-friendly seafood choice?
settings.text: Yes! Blue crabs mature and reproduce VERY quickly. The domestic United States Blue Crab fishery is very sustainable. Also, Blue Crabs are caught in traps that are eco-friendly, in that this method results in very little bycatch and damage to natural ocean and bay habitats.
